text:
Bebo (https://bebo.com), the best live streaming app for gamers.

Full Time, Based in SF or Remote.

Looking for engineers who: Love building stuff Enjoys video games/is a gamer *Want a startup adventure, not big company

Hiring 3 engineers (front-end, video pipeline, ML/Computer Vision)

Team is well funded ($10M+), and founders have a good track record (over $2B+ in prior exits).

email me shaan at bebo dot com to apply
